title: LAG
name: Link Aggregation Group
definition: Identifies this request is ordering Link Aggregation.
fieldNotes: More information relative to link aggregation can be found in IEEE 802.1AX. When link aggregation pertains to ENNI usage, more information can also be found in MEF 26.1.
validEntries: E  = Existing Link Aggregation group. Activity impacting an existing Link Aggregation group  ( add or remove members)  N  = New Link Aggregation group created on this request (The provider will assign a LAG-ID and provide it on the Confirmation Notice)  D  = Disconnect of entire existing Link Aggregation group.
validEntryNotes:
A valid entry of "E" is applicable when the ACT field is "N", "C" or "D". 
A valid entry of "N" is only applicable when the AC T  field is "N".  
A valid entry of "D" is only applicable when the AC T  field is "D".
usageNotes: Optional when the first position of the REQTYP field is "E'' or "S" and the ACT field is "N", "C" or "D", otherwise prohibited.
